note: This does not include cooling impacts from sulphur dioxide and aerosols, so the net warming can be lower.
title: Global warming contributions from fossil fuels and land use
subtitle: Global mean surface temperature change driven by a country or region's cumulative [fossil-fuel](#dod:fossilemissions) and [land-use change](#dod:land-use-change-emissions) emissions of three gases â€“ carbon dioxide, methane, and nitrous oxide.
